Feature Notes:

Draw Funds: May draw 20d10 GP city funds
Enter Building: May enter any freehold, palace, or temple within home city
Grant Pardon: May pardon condemned man within home city
Make Accusation: May accuse freeman or noble of crime within home city
Pass Judgment: May pass judgment on slave, freeman, or noble within home city
Requisition Soldiers: Can call upon 20d4 soldiers within home city

Spells:
Aid (P2 Cosmos): Touched gains +1 attack and damage and +1d8 temporary HP for 21 rd
Animal Friendship (P1 Cosmos): R10' Recruits an animal companion (Save neg)

Barkskin (P2 Cosmos): Touched gains -9 Armor Class and +1 non-spell saves for 24 rd
Bless (P1 Cosmos): R60' Unengaged allies in a 50' sq gain +1 attack and morale (Reverse inflicts -1 on foes) for 6 rd

Control Temperature, 10' Radius (P4 Cosmos): Changes the temperature in a 10' radius by 200F for 24 tn
Creeping Doom (P7 Cosmos): Bugs erupt and attack as directed w/in an 80' radius for 80 rd
Detect Charm (P2 Cosmos): Self discerns charmed state of 1 target/rd in a 30' radius for 1 tn (Reverse shields 1 target)
Divination (P4 Cosmos): Self has a 80% chance to discern info about a known location
Entangle (P1 Cosmos): R80' Plants in a 40' cu immobilize passers (Save half movement) for 1 tn
Enthrall (P2 Cosmos): R90' Captivates listeners w/up to 3 HD for conc up to 1 hr (Save neg)
Exaction (P7 Cosmos): R10' Demands service of extra-planar creature
Feign Death (P3 Cosmos): RTouch Willing target appears dead, takes half damage, and gains immunity to draining for 30 rd
Find The Path (P6 Cosmos): Touched discerns the shortest route into and out of a chosen location for 20 tn (Reverse causes indirection)

Forbiddance (P6 Cosmos): R30' 1200' cu limits magical entry based on alignment and a password
Hallucinatory Forest (P4 Cosmos): R80' Creates an illusionary 800' sq forest
Insect Plague (P5 Air): R360' Stinging insects fill a 180' radius, inflicting 1 HP/rd for 40 rd; creatures w/fewer than 2 HD flee, 3-4 HD check morale
Invisibility To Undead (P1 Cosmos): Touched cannot be detected by undead (Save 5 HD neg) for 6 rd

Locate Animals Or Plants (P1 Cosmos): R500' Self discerns presence of chosen animal or plant type in a 20' path for 20 rd
Locate Object (P3 Cosmos): R260' Self discerns location of a desired object for 8 hr (Reverse obscures)
Magic Font (P5 Water): Allows self to scry via a touched holy water font for 1 hr/vial

Snare (P3 Cosmos): Touched snare becomes 90% undetectable until triggered

Stone Shape (P3 Earth): Reshapes 29' cu of stone
Symbol (P7 Cosmos): Glowing symbol causes hopelessness, pain, or persuasion for 20 tn

Water Walk (P3 Water): 16 touched may walk on liquid for 21 tn
